data.actual_result: It triggers my OCPD and leaves streamer mode in for like 1  second.
data.expected_result: It should not lag out and keep streamer mode in.
data.short_description: If you right click the settings cog then hover over streamer mode and then hover over appearance then streamer mode stays in appearance for like 1 second (look at gif)
data.steps_to_repro: - Right Click the settings cog - hover over streamer mode - then hover over appearance - and repeat it
